diagram_logic_form: The length of the line $VB$ is $8$ units.
The length of the line $HJ$ is $9$ units.
The length of the line $GJ$ is $6$ units.
The length of the line $BC$ is $x$ units.
Point $C$ lies on the line connecting $A$ and $V$.
Point $I$ lies on the line connecting $G$ and $H$.
The line connecting $B$ and $C$ is perpendicular to the line connecting $V$ and $C$.
The line connecting $G$ and $H$ is perpendicular to the line connecting $H$ and $J$.
The measure of angle $BAC$ is equal to the measure of angle $BAV$.
The measure of angle $HGJ$ is equal to the measure of angle $BAV$.
The measure of angle $HGJ$ is equal to the measure of angle $HIJ$.
line_instances: There are lines $AB$, $AC$, $AV$, $BC$, $VB$, and $VC$ forming the figure.
There are lines $GH$, $GI$, $HI$, and $GJ$ forming the figure.
